rationale: Vegetation patterns show natural variation typical of Amazon rainforest. Topographic features appear consistent with natural erosion processes.
Patterns appear consistent with natural forest growth and river meanders. No clear geometric anomalies detected.
Strong geometric patterns visible in RGB imagery suggest human-made structures. Rectangular formations and linear features indicate potential ancient settlement or agricultural terracing.
Linear features extending across the landscape with associated clearings indicate potential causeway or ancient road system.
